trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows progress bar control.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 進度列 (Progress Bar) 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation in one of three styles:
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項以視覺化方式表示在三種樣式的其中一個長時間作業的進度：

trans-unit.source: Segmented blocks that increase in steps from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 在步驟從左到右增加的分段的區塊。

trans-unit.source: A continuous bar that fills in from left to right.
trans-unit.target: 連續的列，填入從左到右。

trans-unit.source: A block that scrolls across a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> in a marquee fashion.
trans-unit.target: 透過捲動的目標區塊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>跑馬燈方式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style%2A> property determines the style of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style%2A>屬性決定的樣式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>顯示。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control can only be oriented horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項只能導向水平。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to create a vertically oriented <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何建立垂直方向的範例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項通常用於應用程式在執行工作，例如將檔案複製或列印文件。

trans-unit.source: Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的使用者可能會考慮應用程式沒有回應，如果沒有視覺提示。

trans-unit.source: By using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> in your application, you alert the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>在您的應用程式，警示使用者應用程式正在執行長時間工作和應用程式是否仍有回應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性會定義範圍的值代表工作的進度。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is typically set to a value of 0, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性通常會設定為值 0，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性通常設定為值，表示工作完成。

trans-unit.source: For example, to properly display the progress when copying a group of files, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property could be set to the total number of files to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要複製的檔案群組時，適當地顯示進度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性無法複製設定為的檔案總數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性表示應用程式已完成此作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: The value displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> only approximates the current value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>只近似的目前值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Based on the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property determines when to display the next block or increase the size of the bar.
trans-unit.target: 根據大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性會決定何時顯示下一個區塊，或增加此橫條的大小。

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> other than changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 有數種方式來修改顯示的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>以外變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>直接屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify a specific value to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property by, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性來指定要遞增的特定值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性，然後再呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，以遞增的值。

trans-unit.source: To vary the increment value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and specify a value with which to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變化的遞增值，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法並指定用來遞增值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A> changes for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> will not be honored when visual styles are enabled on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and above.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> 和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.BackColor%2A>變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>則不會遵照上啟用視覺化樣式時[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和更新版本。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control to display the progress of a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties to specify a range for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> that is equivalent to the number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，以指定的範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> as a file is copied.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，以遞增的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>在複製檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control created called `pBar1` that is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，而且沒有方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。

trans-unit.source: The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`範例中定義的方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to 100, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性設定為 0，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性設定為 100，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性設為 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can accept data that the user drags onto it.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否能接受使用者拖放上來的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if drag-and-drop operations are allowed in the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項內允許拖放作業，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background image for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 控制項的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: The current background image.
trans-unit.target: 目前的背景影像。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A>沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A> has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImage%2A>沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the layout of the background image of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定進度列的背景影像配置。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property has no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>屬性沒有任何作用的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control, when it receives focus, causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項取得焦點時，是否會在任何需要驗證的控制項上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control, when it receives focus, causes validation to be performed on any controls that require validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項取得焦點時會在需要驗證的任何控制項上執行驗證，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.CausesValidation" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.CausesValidation" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Creates a handle for the control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateParams" />。

trans-unit.source: Information needed when you create a control.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制項時所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: for access to unmanaged code when getting the property value.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取 unmanaged 程式碼時取得屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項支援的預設輸入法 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that represents the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />，表示控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control should redraw its surface using a secondary buffer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否應使用次要緩衝區重繪其介面。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if a secondary buffer should be used, <see langword="false" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 如果必須使用次要緩衝區則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.DoubleBuffered%2A> property has no effect on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.DoubleBuffered%2A>屬性沒有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user double-clicks the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於使用者按兩下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.DoubleClick> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.DoubleClick>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when focus enters the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於焦點進入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個事件與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Enter> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項無法接收鍵盤焦點，讓它永遠不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Enter>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font of text in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 中文字的字型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> of the text.
trans-unit.target: 文字的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font set by the container.
trans-unit.target: 預設為容器所設定的字型。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Font" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Font" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input method editor (IME) for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 的輸入法 (IME)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性與這個類別無關。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ImeMode" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ImeMode" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.
trans-unit.target: 用來遞增進度列目前位置的依據數量。

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的數量來前移進度列的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法可讓您根據特定的數量遞增進度列的值。

trans-unit.source: This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是會遞增進度列，類似於使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性會指定目前的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值大於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值會保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>含有負值中指定的方法`value`參數，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性小於的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性保持在值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> object whose style is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee> displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> is unnecessary and will raise an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>物件設定其樣式為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee>顯示持續捲動列，而不是其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>是不必要的且會引發<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property to increment the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值遞增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>。

trans-unit.source: The example also displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to provide a textual representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>提供的文字表示法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control, named `progressBar1`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `statusBarPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項，名為`progressBar1`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>包含控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>具名`statusBarPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>, named `time`, must be added to the form as a member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>具名`time`，必須以成員形式加入。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style" /> property is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" />
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style" /> 屬性設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 發生於焦點在控制項，且使用者按下按鍵時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control cannot receive keyboard focus, so it never raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.KeyDown> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項無法接收鍵盤焦點，讓它永遠不會引發<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.KeyDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user presses a key while the control has focus.

trans-unit.target: 發生於焦點離開 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定進度區塊捲動完整個進度列所需的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The time period, in milliseconds, that it takes the progress block to scroll across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 進度區塊捲動完整個進度列所需的時間長度 (以毫秒為單位)。

trans-unit.source: A marquee-style progress indicator does not display progress; instead it indicates that an operation is occurring by moving the progress block across the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 跑馬燈樣式的進度列指示器不會顯示進度。而是它會指出發生作業的進度區塊移動個進度列。

trans-unit.source: Since the marquee animation speed is a time period, setting the value to a higher number results in a slower speed and a lower number results in a faster speed.
trans-unit.target: 因為跑馬燈動畫的速度是一段時間的值設定為較高數字會導致較慢的速度及較低數字會導致更快的速度。

trans-unit.source: The indicated time period is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的時間長度小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum value of the range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項範圍的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: 範圍的最大值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 100。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定的上限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 當值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the progress bar is completely filled.
trans-unit.target: 當值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>完全填滿屬性，進度列。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a value to which the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be set (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property or using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> methods) to indicate that an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個屬性指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性必須設定 (藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性，或使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法) 來表示作業已完成。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files in a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>檔案複製作業中的檔案總數的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Each time a file is copied, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property can be increased by 1 until the total number of files is copied.
trans-unit.target: 複製檔案時，每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性可以增加 1，直到複製的檔案總數。

trans-unit.source: At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled.
trans-unit.target: 此時，會完全填入進度列。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control to display the progress of a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties to specify a range for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> that is equivalent to the number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，以指定的範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> as a file is copied.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，以遞增的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>在複製檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control created called `pBar1` that is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，而且沒有方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。

trans-unit.source: The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example and that the method is called from another method or event in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`範例中定義的方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值小於 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum value of the range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項範圍的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value of the range.
trans-unit.target: 範圍的最小值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性指定的下限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 當值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性變更，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>以反映新的控制項範圍重繪控制項時。

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the progress bar is empty.
trans-unit.target: 當值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性，進度列是空的。

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the progress bar, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更進度列的值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法，或設定值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>直接屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control to display the progress of a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。

trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。

trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged(System.EventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the space between the edges of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> control and its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 控制項的邊緣和其內容之間的間距。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.Padding.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding%2A> property will have no effect on the appearance of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding%2A>屬性不會影響的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Padding" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 發生於繪製 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step" /> 屬性所設定的量，在進度列上從目前位置前進到下一個位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法遞增進度列的值所指定的數量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性來指定在作業中每個已完成的工作進度列的值變更的數量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您要複製的檔案群組中，您可能想要設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>1 的值屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性来複製的檔案總數。

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每個檔案複製時，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法來遞增進度列的值來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要擁有更有彈性之值的進度列控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法設定的值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>直接屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性會指定目前的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值大於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值會保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method with a negative value specified in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>含有負值中指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性小於的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值會保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>屬性.

trans-unit.source: Because a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> object whose style is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee> displays a continuously scrolling bar instead of its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>, calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> is unnecessary and will raise an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>物件設定其樣式為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee>顯示持續捲動列，而不是其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>是不必要的且會引發<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control to display the progress of a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties to specify a range for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> that is equivalent to the number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，以指定的範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> as a file is copied.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，以遞增的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>在複製檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control created called `pBar1` that is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。

trans-unit.source: The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`在範例中，定義方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Style" /> 設定為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee" />。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> to its default value.
trans-unit.target: 重設 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor" /> 為其預設值。

trans-unit.source: Calling this method will reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> to <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Highlight%2A> unless the method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法將會重設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>至<xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Highlight%2A>除非在衍生類別中覆寫此方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ResetForeColor%2A> method is useful when you create a designer for the control, or you are creating your own control that incorporates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.ResetForeColor%2A>方法很有用，當您建立控制項的設計工具或您要建立您自己的控制項，其中包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> and any text it contains is displayed from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 及其所包含的文字是否由右至左顯示。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> is displayed from right to left; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 是由右至左顯示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A> property is useful when creating an application for use with languages that read from right to left.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout%2A>屬性相當實用的應用程式，以建立與由右至左讀取的語言。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> named `ProgressBar1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>名為`ProgressBar1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which a call to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep" /> method increases the current position of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數量，以其做為呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep" /> 方法時對進度列目前位置的增量。

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar with each call to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 每次呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep" /> 方法時進度列遞增的數量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性來指定在作業中每個已完成的工作進度列的值變更的數量。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您要複製的檔案群組中，您可能想要設定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>1 的值屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性来複製的檔案總數。

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每個檔案複製時，您可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法來遞增進度列的值來<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要擁有更有彈性之值的進度列控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法設定的值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>直接屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control to display the progress of a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項來顯示檔案複製作業的進度。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties to specify a range for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> that is equivalent to the number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性，以指定的範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>也就是要複製的檔案數字相等。

trans-unit.source: The code also uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> as a file is copied.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，以遞增的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>在複製檔案。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control created called `pBar1` that is created within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>, and that there is a method created called `CopyFile` (that returns a Boolean value indicating the file copy operation was completed successfully) that performs the file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>建立呼叫控制項`pBar1`內建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>，以及是否有一種方法建立呼叫`CopyFile`（會傳回布林值，指出檔案複製作業已順利完成），以執行檔案複製作業。

trans-unit.source: The code also requires that an array of strings containing the files to copy is created and passed to the `CopyWithProgress` method defined in the example, and that the method is called from another method or event in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也需要建立和傳遞給包含要複製的檔案的字串陣列`CopyWithProgress`在範例中，定義方法，並從另一個方法或事件中的呼叫方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the manner in which progress should be indicated on the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定在進度列上表示進度所用的方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Blocks" />
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Blocks" />

trans-unit.source: You can use the marquee style when you need to indicate progress is being made, without indicating the quantity of progress.
trans-unit.target: 當您需要以指出正在進行時，不含指出進度的數量時，您可以使用跑馬燈樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee> style is honored only when visual styles are enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Marquee>啟用視覺化樣式時，才會接受一個樣式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Continuous> style is honored when visual styles are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle.Continuous>樣式則會採用未啟用視覺化樣式時。

trans-unit.source: The value is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 這個值不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle" /> 列舉的成員。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop" />.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Control.TabStop" />。

trans-unit.source: true if the user can set the focus to the control by using the TAB key; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者可以使用 TAB 鍵將焦點設定給控制項則為 true，否則為 false。

trans-unit.source: The default is true.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 true。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.TabStop" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.TabStop" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的相關文字。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Text" /> 屬性變更時。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串，代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />.
trans-unit.target: 字串，代表目前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar" />。

trans-unit.source: The return string includes the type and the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 傳回字串包含類型和值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current position of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定進度列的目前位置。

trans-unit.source: The position within the range of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 進度列範圍內的位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: The minimum and maximum values of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property are specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 最小和最大值的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性所指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to increment or decrement the value of the progress bar directly.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您增加或減少進度列直接的值。

trans-unit.source: To perform consistent increases in the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行中的值一致增加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Step%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To increase the progress bar value by varying amounts, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加不同數量的進度列的值，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property to increment the value of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick> event of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性的值遞增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer.Tick>事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>。

trans-unit.source: The example also displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A> property in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to provide a textual representation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也會顯示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Value%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>提供的文字表示法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>。

trans-unit.source: This example requires that you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control, named `progressBar1`, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, named `statusBarPanel1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例需要您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控制項，名為`progressBar1`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>包含控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>具名`statusBarPanel1`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>, named `time`, must be added to the form as a member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>具名`time`，必須以成員形式加入。

trans-unit.source: The value specified is greater than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定值大於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Maximum" /> 屬性的數值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The value specified is less than the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.Minimum" /> 屬性的數值。
